details.arabic_diacless: اللٰهم اجعلني من التوابين واجعلني من المتطهرين
details.arabic: اَللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِيْ مِنَ التَّوَّابِيْنَ وَاجْعَلْنِيْ مِنَ الْمُتَطَهِّرِيْنَ
details.translations: O Allah, make me among those who turn to You in repentance, and make me among those who are purified.
details.reference: At-Tirmithi 1/78. See also Al-Albani, Sahih At- Tirmithi 1/18
